verses.content: Aw hnam tinrênghai, LALPA chu inpâk unla, Mi tinrênghai, ama chu inpâk ro.
A ngilneina chu ei chungah a nasain, LALPA thutak chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a. LALPA chu inpâk ro.
